title: Pro Manage
description: Developed a real-time Tasks managing application using the MERN Stack. Implemented user authentication and authorization functionalities using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and bcrypt for secure access to the application. State management is done using the Redux.Integrated MongoDB as the database solution for storing tasks and user data.

title: Let's Chat
description: Developed a real-time chat application using MERN Stack, ensuring instant message delivery. Implemented user authentication and authorization functionalities. Integrated MongoDB as the database solution for storing chat messages and user data.

title: Super App
description: This is a customized app for which recommends users movies upon selecting genre and users get personal space for writing notes and using timer. This app also diplays latest news and weather details from respective APIs.

title: Pocket Notes App
description: Developed a responsive web application using React.js for managing group notes efficiently. Implemented features allowing users to create notes within designated groups.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Gaame
description: This is a customized Rock Paper Scissors game. Implemented the user interface using HTML, CSS and game logic using JavaScript.
